case.title: nightcap in town (my treat...) - 35 (soho/camden)
case.text:
well, after a sub-optimal evening in finishing off some work, i've developed a bit of a thirst and a strong desire to escape into town! any interesting gal care to join me for a few swift drinks in soho/camden? i'm 35, fun company, in good shape physically (and mentally - hi to all the nutters on this site!).
pic available in response to genuine replies
